Wikipedia needs your help!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2005 Topics (Year of the Mocchi Scream): Wikipedia needs your help!
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, November 24, 2005 - 05:18 pm:

I've been noticing that someone has been making wikipedia entries for the MR games, but has been making a lot of errors in the process. It would probably be helpful if people could go over and edit some of these entries. Things I have noticed so far, is the constant referring to the GBA games as "Advanced" when the actual titles do not have a 'd' on the end. There's also a reference to Ape not being in MR3, which is untrue, there's an Ape as the 'lord' of Brillia. But, the errors appear to be many, and carry accross many pages. So any help anyone can give would be greatly appreciated.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, November 24, 2005 - 05:25 pm:

I just changed one entry that claimed that Mocchi is a monster created to look like sushi!!!

By Lisa Shock on Friday, November 25, 2005 - 10:44 am:

MF5 should be out in December. Jamboree was announced over a year ago, but never got a date, and I suspect it might be cancelled because Tecmo didn't show anything about it at the Tokyo Game Show this year. Tecmo Japan wasn't really talking about it much before, now they aren't talking about it at all. Some people left the company, this might be involved with that.
